meta.title: Starter: Welcome to SyncTimer
meta.notes:
This sheet demonstrates every commonly used element:
• Title, Notes, and Tags on the Details tab • Global Tempo & Time Signature (Metered mode) • Tempo Changes and Time Signature Changes • Events list: Cue (flash), Stop (with Hold), Restart • Absolute-time vs Metered (musical position) authoring
Tips: +– Absolute-time events NEVER change when you edit tempo/meter. +– Metered events display as Bar/Beat/Subdivision and update live with tempo/meter. +– Tap the “@ position” label to momentarily reveal absolute time. +– Paperclip in the Events bar opens the Cue Sheets library (this file lives there).
